title: Inclusion
description: We strive for an inclusive environment where everyone feels comfortable bringing their best self to work.

title: Trust
description: We act in good faith and rely on each other to catch us when we fall.

title: Honesty
description: We openly share our mistakes with each other, they are part of life and it's how we learn and grow.

title: Transpacency
description: Transparency is key to building trust and respect and enabling our people to thrive.

title: Accountability
description: We strive to be aware of situations, take ownership of issues and collaboratively find solutions to continuously make things better.
